content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Many IHS Markit resources are internal and can only be accessed using VPN. To enable access there is an established site-to-site VPN connection between EPAM and IHS Markit. In order to access the site-to-site VPN you need to be connected using EPAM GlobalProtect VPN via either \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"vpn-eu, vpn-ua or vpn-us\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" gateways.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resources accessible through VPN are added there based on whitelist principle. If you need to access certain IHS Markit resource and it’s not opening even through VPN, it could be that it wasn’t added to the whitelist yet. Please reach out to your DM for support.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Info: IHS Markit also uses GlobalProtect as their primary VPN client, however it is not compatible with EPAM GlobalProtect installation. Only use the EPAM one. Some projects use additional VPN clients for historical reasons. Normally you would learn if you need to use one as part of project onboarding.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
